info.title: Service Quality Management
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Service Quality Management specification

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated properties to display in response

parameters.name: conformanceComparator
parameters.description:
For filtering: An operator that specifies whether a Service Level Objective is 
violated above or below the conformanceTarget.

parameters.name: conformanceTarget
parameters.description:
For filtering: A value used to determine if Service Level Objective is met. 
The data type should be adjusted case by case.

parameters.name: graceTimes
parameters.description:
For filtering: The number of times an objective can remain un-updated without 
a violation of a Service Level Agreement in reference to a measurement period and/or Service Level Agreement reporting period.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: For filtering: The name of the service level objectives.

parameters.name: thresholdTarget
parameters.description:
For filtering: A value that used to specify when a warning should be used 
that indicates an objective is danger of not being met. Notice, the data type should be adjusted case by case.

parameters.name: toleranceTarget
parameters.description:
For filtering: A value that specifies the allowable variation of a conformance 
Target. The data type should be adjusted case by case.

parameters.name: tolerancePeriod.startDateTime
parameters.description: For filtering: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

parameters.name: tolerancePeriod.endDateTime
parameters.description: For filtering: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

parameters.name: conformancePeriod.startDateTime
parameters.description: For filtering: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

parameters.name: conformancePeriod.endDateTime
parameters.description: For filtering: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

parameters.name: validFor.startDateTime
parameters.description: For filtering: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

parameters.name: validFor.endDateTime
parameters.description: For filtering: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

parameters.name: serviceLevelSpecParameter.name
parameters.description: For filtering: The name of parameter.

parameters.name: serviceLevelSpecParameter.serviceParmCategory
parameters.description: For filtering: A string that specifies whether the Service Level Specification Parameter is technology specific, service specific, or technology/service independent

parameters.name: serviceLevelSpecParameter.serviceParmPerspective
parameters.description:
For filtering: A string that specifies whether the Service Level Specification 
Parameter represents a single user instance parameter or a parameter that represents an aggregation.

parameters.name: serviceLevelSpecParameter.transformationAlgorithmOfKQI
parameters.description:
For filtering: The description of a logical step-by-step procedure used to 
calculate the value of a KQI.

parameters.name: serviceLevelSpecParameter.type
parameters.description: For filtering: Types of Service Level Specification parameters are KQI or KPI.

parameters.name: serviceLevelSpecConsquence.prescribedAction
parameters.description:
For filtering: Recommended remedy for a violated Service Level Objective. 
This could be a hyperlink to the recommended action.

parameters.name: serviceLevelObjective
parameters.description: The Service Level Objective to be created

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the Service Level Objective

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the Service Level Objective

parameters.name: serviceLevelObjective
parameters.description: The Service Level Objective to be updated

post.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data containing the callback endpoint to deliver the information

delete.description: Resets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the registered listener

ServiceLevelObjective.description:
Service level objectives are defined in terms of parameters and metrics, thresholds, and tolerances 
associated with the parameters.

conformanceComparator.description:
An operator that specifies whether a Service Level Objective is 
violated above or below the conformanceTarget.

conformanceTarget.description:
A value used to determine if Service Level Objective is met. 
The data type should be adjusted case by case.

graceTimes.description:
The number of times an objective can remain un-updated without 
a violation of a Service Level Agreement in reference to a measurement period and/or Service Level Agreement reporting period.

href.description: The hyperlink to access a service level objective.

id.description: The identifier of a service level objectives.

name.description: The name of the service level objectives.

thresholdTarget.description:
A value that used to specify when a warning should be used 
that indicates an objective is danger of not being met. Notice, the data type should be adjusted case by case.

toleranceTarget.description:
A value that specifies the allowable variation of a conformance 
Target. The data type should be adjusted case by case.

conformancePeriod.description: An interval of time during which the Conformance Target must be measured.

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

ServiceLevelObjective_Create.description:
Service level objectives are defined in terms of parameters and metrics, thresholds, and tolerances 
associated with the parameters.

conformanceComparator.description:
An operator that specifies whether a Service Level Objective is 
violated above or below the conformanceTarget.

conformanceTarget.description:
A value used to determine if Service Level Objective is met. 
The data type should be adjusted case by case.

graceTimes.description:
The number of times an objective can remain un-updated without 
a violation of a Service Level Agreement in reference to a measurement period and/or Service Level Agreement reporting period.

name.description: The name of the service level objectives.

thresholdTarget.description:
A value that used to specify when a warning should be used 
that indicates an objective is danger of not being met. Notice, the data type should be adjusted case by case.

toleranceTarget.description:
A value that specifies the allowable variation of a conformance 
Target. The data type should be adjusted case by case.

conformancePeriod.description: An interval of time during which the Conformance Target must be measured.

ServiceLevelSpecification.description:
A Service Level Specification represents a pre-defined or negotiated set of Service Level 
Objectives. In addition, certain consequences are associated with not meeting the Service Level 
Objectives. Service Level Agreements are expressed in terms of Service Level Specifications.

description.description: A brief introduction of a service level specification.

href.description: The hyperlink to access a service level specification.

id.description: The identifier to a service level specification.

name.description: The name of Service Level Specification

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

ServiceLevelSpecification_Create.description:
A Service Level Specification represents a pre-defined or negotiated set of Service Level 
Objectives. In addition, certain consequences are associated with not meeting the Service Level 
Objectives. Service Level Agreements are expressed in terms of Service Level Specifications.
Skipped properties: id,href

description.description: A brief introduction of a service level specification.

name.description: The name of Service Level Specification

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

ServiceLevelSpecification_Update.description:
A Service Level Specification represents a pre-defined or negotiated set of Service Level 
Objectives. In addition, certain consequences are associated with not meeting the Service Level 
Objectives. Service Level Agreements are expressed in terms of Service Level Specifications.

description.description: A brief introduction of a service level specification.

name.description: The name of Service Level Specification

TimePeriod.description: A base / value business entity used to represent a period of time between two timepoints.

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

ServiceLevelSpecParameter.description:
Service Level Specification parameters can be one of two types. A Key Quality Indicator (KQI) 
provides a measurement of a specific aspect of the performance of a Product (i.e., Product 
Specification, Product Offering, or Product) or a Service (i.e., Service Specification or Service).

serviceParmCategory.description: A string that specifies whether the Service Level Specification Parameter is technology specific, service specific, or technology/service independent

serviceParmPerspective.description:
A string that specifies whether the Service Level Specification 
Parameter represents a single user instance parameter or a parameter that represents an aggregation.

transformationAlgorithmOfKQI.description:
The description of a logical step-by-step procedure used to 
calculate the value of a KQI.

type.description: Types of Service Level Specification parameters are KQI or KPI.

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

ServiceLevelSpecConsquence.description:
Some consequences for the provider of the Service are resulted when the service level objective
does not meet.

prescribedAction.description:
Recommended remedy for a violated Service Level Objective. 
This could be a hyperlink to the recommended action.

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

RelatedEntityRef.description:
The related entity source of a KQI or KPI. A KQI draws its data from a number of sources, 
including Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).  A KPI provides a measurement of a specific aspect 
of the performance of a Service (whether it is a network- or a non-network-based Service) or a 
group of Services of the same type.

herf.description: The hyperlink to access an entity.

RelatedServiceLevelObjectiveRef.description: A set of Service Level Objectives that are contained in the Service Level Specification.

href.description: The hyperlink to access a service level object.

id.description: The identifier of a service level object.

code.description: An integer coding the error type. This is given to caller so he can translate them if required.

message.description: A short localized string that describes the error.

description.description: (optional) A long localized error description if needed. It can contain precise information about which parameter is missing, or what are the identifier acceptable values.

infoURL.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.
